entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:15 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:15 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
